name: MaxLife Insurance [CPS] IN
name_aliases: max life, mazluge, Insurance, Max Life Insurence,
description:
Company description : Max Life Insurance, one of the foremost life insurance companies in India, believes in contributing to the social and economic development of the society. See how we are making a difference to people’s lives. they have plans like Online Insurance Plans, Online Term Plan, Child Plans, Retirement Plans, ULIP Plans, NRI Plans, Defence Plans, Tools & Calculators, Real Value Tool, Continue with existing eQuote, Investment Plan, Sabse Pahle Life Insurance, Tax Saving Investment etc.

Campaign Description : Campaign is on CPS model wherein we need to bring genuine term insurance sales for the brand.

Validation Criteria : Approved Sales. 

KPI : ATS should be INR 24,000 without GST

It is an offline campaign.

name: EKTA Traveling Insurance Any GEOs
name_aliases: EKTA Traveling, Travel Insurance, Insurance, summer, vacation, rest
description:
EKTA Traveling is a new generation fintech company that offers high-tech insurance products in the following segments: tourism and aviation, financial risk insurance, property and equipment insurance. The insurance products are fully digitalized, which makes it possible to improve the quality and speed of customer service both at the stage of selling insurance and at the stage of applying for an insured event.

Benefits for webmasters:


	One landing - one offer;
	Transparent model of confirmation and cancellation of purchases by the client - solely upon request;
	widespread geography for promoting the product WorldWide (Any contries)


A wide range of available advertising tools (except for spam, adult and doorway)
Convenient and comprehensible landing page in many languages, which works correctly on all devices and browsers
Reliable company, in 2019 about 3,000,000 clients became our clients.
We are open to dialogue and are ready to improve the page / advertising materials to increase the conversion to sale.
Upon achieving good sales results, we can offer additional bonuses.
Functional technical support

World Wide Travel Health Insurance + Covid

This offer is for people who travel or go abroad. Everyone between the ages of 1 and 100 can buy it online on a website. You will receive your insurance policy by email within 2-3 minutes. There is a multilingual technical support chat 24/7.

There are 3 packages from cheap to expensive – Start, Gold, Max+

Payment for an insurance policy is automated. It is made right on the website. You don`t need to leave a request, cause we don`t have a sales department. The product prices featured on the website are displayed in USD.

Travel insurance (offer) is suitable for a broad audience:

Tourists, travelers, pregnant, grandfathers, grandmothers, students, people who go to a full-time job, business trip, a conference. Any kind of tour package, cruise, liner.

Types of holidays:

Tourism, active leisure, all sports amateur and professional, all kinds of extreme time.

It is suitable for citizens of any country and to apply for a visa

Most civilized countries demand travel insurance covering COVID-19 for entry into the country. This is why the topic is highly relevant.

Tourists can choose any transport for their travel insurance – air, sea, railway, or auto.

Followed the link for detailed information on the insurance product and target audience: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1zv_NzcbTWyUys3YJn08qH6z6MbHYxoKpPAGrLfW-PU0

Creatives for placement in advertising sources are available at the link:

https://drive.google.com/drive/u/2/folders/1mflBLrA1zr2QjEf2dPGqtbC4znW4A3kQ

GEO: World Wide

Limits of the leads: Absent

Benefits of the Ekta Traveling insurance policy


	Covers COVID-19
	Valid all over the world
	Favorable price for insurance
	Favorable filling of insurance
	No hidden clauses in the contract
	Simplified online purchase form
	The site accepts payments from all countries of the world
	Payment system immediately on the site, without extra transition


Limitation by the traffic:


	You can use traffic sources that are not on the list (for instance, Pornhub). 
	It is forbidden to maintain groups (accounts/channels) in any social networks and messengers on behalf of the advertiser or with the brand name of the company, as well as use the company name in the domain name.
	We forbid context on the brand, any geo in any language, motivated traffic for this offer.
	You can use doorway traffic only through prelanding.

name: ICICI Lombard [CPS] IN
description:
Company Description: ICICI Lombard GIC Ltd. is one of the leading private general insurance company in India with a Gross Written Premium (GWP) of Rs 135.93 billion for the year ended March 31, 2020. ICICI Lombard is available digitally through Il Take Care App for all your insurance and wellness needs. This app is a one-stop solution for all your claims, policy renewal, paying premiums, storing all documents on the app - whether health, travel or motor.ICICI Lombard General Insurance Company Limited is a general insurance company in India. It is engaged in general insurance, reinsurance, insurance claims management, and investment management.

Campaign Description: ICICI Lombard campaign is a CPS campaign wherein we must bring genuine sales to client. The advertiser is offering its affiliates to run it with mentioned targeted cities and audiences. 

Targeting: Pan India

Targeting audience: Age Group: 24+, Male, ,Monthly Income: 25000 & above, DRR : 100 Leads.

Campaign Objective: To generate sales for ICICI Lombard.

Soft KPI -

Lead to Sale ratio to be maintained above 3%
Average policy amount should not be below 12K

name: ePojisteni CZ CPL
description:
ePojištění is the largest and most important insurance comparator on the Czech Internet. It concludes more than 1,000 auto insurance contracts per week. They are known in the media and their prices are really the lowest. They cooperate with all insurance companies on the Czech market.

Implementation of new measurement for eInsurance campaigns!

All tracking links are redirected to the main ePojištění.cz campaign (formerly Povinné ručení ePojištění.cz), to which we have added individual URLs and all creative elements from other ePojištění campaigns.

Therefore, there will now be only one campaign called ePojištění.cz in the eSpolupráce menu, where you will be able to precisely target other ePojištění campaigns via individual URLs. Therefore, if you need to target exactly one of the ePojštění campaigns (for example, property insurance), you need to generate a new tracking link with the appropriate URL so that you can link exactly to the required landing page (or form) of the ePojštění campaign. By generating a new link, you will also speed up page loading (no redirection will take place).

It is also important to say that XSELL also works between individual campaigns.

Runaways:
As for follow-ups, automatic measurement is no longer possible after stopping the original campaigns. Therefore, all overruns will be finished immediately after sending reports from the advertiser!

Conversion measurement:
The new measurement is set up so that Postback is called on every request. However, the commission model for this campaign is set as CPL (pay per lead). For this reason, duplicate conversions are created, which are immediately rejected because they are the same leads. However, if multiple inquiries arise from one (same) lead, which subsequently convert into closed and paid contracts, you are entitled to a commission for each of these conversions according to the appropriate reward (depending on the type of campaign).


Example:
--- "Affiliate partner brings in a lead that creates a demand for liability insurance. So the affiliate gets paid for the lead. Subsequently, this same contact (lead) generates another demand for accident insurance, travel insurance and property insurance. This causes that for liability this affiliate partner no longer gets paid for the lead, but in the case of a negotiated and paid contract for the other requests (accident insurance, property insurance and travel insurance), the commission is normally calculated for the partner according to the conditions of the given campaign." ---

No bidding on keywords and titles listed in THIS DOCUMENT! Violation of this prohibition may lead to blocking in ePojisteni.cz campaigns.

Commission model: Payment for a valid lead - callable and interested in POV. The conversion appears in the system within 10 minutes. 

Attention! Only quality leads get paid! Advertiser reserves the right to retroactively reject invalid leads.
What is quality further in the rules:
The minimum sales conversion threshold should be between 12% and 30%. If the conversion is below the minimum threshold, such registrations will not be paid.

CZ

ePojištění je největším a nejvýznamnějším srovnávačem pojištění na českém internetu. Týdně uzavírá více jak 1000 smluv ohledně pojištění vozidel. Jsou mediálně známí a jejich ceny jsou skutečně nejnižší. Spolupracují se všemi pojišťovnami na českém trhu.

Implementace nového měření u kampaní ePojištění!

Veškeré tracking linky jsou přesměrovány na hlavní kampaň ePojištění.cz (dříve Povinné ručení ePojištění.cz), do které jsme přidali jednotlivé URLs a všechny kreativní prvky z ostatních kampaní ePojištění.

Nově tedy bude v nabídce eSpolupráce pouze jedna kampaň s názvem ePojištění.cz, kde budete moci přesně cílit přes jednotlivé URLs i na ostatní kampaně ePojištění. Pokud tedy potřebujete zacílit přesně na jednu z kampaní ePojištění (například pojištění majetku), je třeba si vygenerovat nový tracking link s patřičnou URL, abyste mohli přesně odkazovat na požadovanou landing page (nebo formulář) kampaně ePojištění majetek. Vygenerováním nového linku tak navíc urychlíte načítání stránky (nebude probíhat přesměrování).

Důležité je také říct, že zároveň funguje XSELL mezi jednotlivými kampaněmi.

Doběhy:
Co se týká doběhů, tak automatické měření již po zastavení původních kampaní není možné. Proto veškeré doběhy budou dohrávány vzápětí po zaslání reportů od inzerenta!

Měření konverzí:
Nové měření je nastaveno tak, že se Postback volá při každé poptávce. Provizní model u této kampaně je však nastaven jako CPL (platba za lead). Z toho důvodu se vytváří duplicitní konverze, které jsou ihned zamítány, jelikož jde o stejné leady. Pokud ale z jednoho (stejného) leadu vznikne vícero poptávek, které následně konvertují do uzavřených a zaplacených smluv, vzniká Vám nárok na provizi za každou z těchto konverzí podle patřičné odměny (dle typu kampaně).


Příklad:
--- "Affiliate partner přivede lead, který vytvoří poptávku na povinné ručení. Partner tedy dostane platbu za lead. Následně tento stejný kontakt (lead) vytvoří další poptávku na havarijní pojištění, cestovní pojištění a pojištění majetku. To způsobí, že za povinné ručení už tento affiliate partner nedostává zaplaceno za lead, ale v případě sjednané a zaplacené smlouvy u těch ostatních poptávek (havarijní pojištění, pojištění majetku a cestovní pojištění) se partnerovi počítá provize normálně dle podle podmínek dané kampaně." ---

 

Zákaz bidování na klíčová slova a názvy uvedené v TOMTO DOKUMENTU! Porušení tohoto zákazu může vést k blokaci v kampaních ePojisteni.cz.

Provizní model:Platba za validní lead - dovolatelný a se zájmem o POV. Konverze se v systému objevuje do 10 minut.

Pozor! Pouze kvalitní leady podléhají platbě! Inzerent si vyhrazuje právo zpětně zamítnout nevalidní leady.
Co je kvalita dále v pravidlech:
Minimální práh konverze prodeje by měl být od 18 % do 30 %. Pokud je konverze pod minimální hranicí, takové registrace nebudou zaplaceny.

name: Acko Bike [CPS] IN
description:
Company Description :
Acko is a general insurance company having more that 50 Million unique users .ACKO is an IRDAI licensed (IRDAI Registration No: 157) General Insurance company offering  Car, Two-Wheeler, Taxi and Health Insurance plans on www.acko.com. They are also partnered with leading Indian companies like Amazon, Ola, MakeMyTrip, Zomato, OYO, RedBus, etc to offer insurance like mobile screen insurance, passenger cover, and much more.ACKO has sold more than 60 Crore insurance policies .

Campaign Description : The campaign is based on CPS MODEL . 

Target Geo : Pan India

name: Tu Momento Seguros MX
name_aliases:
Seguros
Carros
Seguros de autos 
autos 
Cars
Insurance
Ensurance
Segruros
description:
Momento Seguros es una compañía de seguros mexicana que ofrece seguros de auto. Fue fundada en 2022 y está regulada por la Comisión Nacional de Seguros y Fianzas (CNSF).

La misión de Momento Seguros es "democratizar la industria aseguradora en México". La compañía busca ofrecer seguros de auto asequibles y accesibles a todos los mexicanos.

Momento Seguros ofrece una amplia gama de coberturas para autos, incluyendo:


	Responsabilidad civil
	Daños materiales
	Gastos médicos
	Robo
	Incendio
	Asistencia vial


La compañía también ofrece pagos flexibles y un proceso de cotización y contratación sencillo.

Ventajas de Momento Seguros:


	Seguros asequibles
	Coberturas flexibles
	Pagos flexibles
	Proceso de cotización y contratación sencillo

name: ePojisteni CZ CPS
description:
ePojištění is the largest and most important insurance comparator on the Czech Internet. It concludes more than 1,000 auto insurance contracts per week. They are known in the media and their prices are really the lowest. They cooperate with all insurance companies on the Czech market.

Implementation of new measurement for eInsurance campaigns!

All tracking links are redirected to the main ePojištění.cz campaign (formerly Povinné ručení ePojištění.cz), to which we have added individual URLs and all creative elements from other ePojištění campaigns.

Therefore, there will now be only one campaign called ePojištění.cz in the eSpolupráce menu, where you will be able to precisely target other ePojištění campaigns via individual URLs. Therefore, if you need to target exactly one of the ePojštění campaigns (for example, property insurance), you need to generate a new tracking link with the appropriate URL so that you can link exactly to the required landing page (or form) of the ePojštění campaign. By generating a new link, you will also speed up page loading (no redirection will take place).

It is also important to say that XSELL also works between individual campaigns.

Runaways:
As for follow-ups, automatic measurement is no longer possible after stopping the original campaigns. Therefore, all overruns will be finished immediately after sending reports from the advertiser!


ATTENTION:
It is not possible to set redirection for IFRAME forms! It is therefore necessary to generate them again and implement them on your websites from the new ePojištění.cz campaign ( ePojisteni CZ CPL). Loading old IFRAMS won't work!


Example:
--- "Affiliate partner brings in a lead that creates a demand for liability insurance. So the affiliate gets paid for the lead. Subsequently, this same contact (lead) generates another demand for accident insurance, travel insurance and property insurance. This causes that for liability this affiliate partner no longer gets paid for the lead, but in the case of a negotiated and paid contract for the other requests (accident insurance, property insurance and travel insurance), the commission is normally calculated for the partner according to the conditions of the given campaign." ---

No bidding on keywords and titles listed in THIS DOCUMENT! Violation of this prohibition may lead to blocking in ePojisteni.cz campaigns.

CZ

Veškeré tracking linky jsou přesměrovány na hlavní kampaň ePojištění.cz (dříve Povinné ručení ePojištění.cz), do které jsme přidali jednotlivé URLs a všechny kreativní prvky z ostatních kampaní ePojištění.

Nově tedy bude v nabídce eSpolupráce pouze jedna kampaň s názvem ePojištění.cz, kde budete moci přesně cílit přes jednotlivé URLs i na ostatní kampaně ePojištění. Pokud tedy potřebujete zacílit přesně na jednu z kampaní ePojištění (například pojištění majetku), je třeba si vygenerovat nový tracking link s patřičnou URL, abyste mohli přesně odkazovat na požadovanou landing page (nebo formulář) kampaně ePojištění majetek. Vygenerováním nového linku tak navíc urychlíte načítání stránky (nebude probíhat přesměrování).

POZOR:
U IFRAME formulářů není možné nastavit přesměrování! Je tedy nutné vygenerovat si je znovu a implementovat je na Vaše weby právě z nové kampaně ePojištění.cz (ePojisteni CZ CPL). Načítání starých IFRAMŮ nebude fungovat!


Příklad:
--- "Affiliate partner přivede lead, který vytvoří poptávku na povinné ručení. Partner tedy dostane platbu za lead. Následně tento stejný kontakt (lead) vytvoří další poptávku na havarijní pojištění, cestovní pojištění a pojištění majetku. To způsobí, že za povinné ručení už tento affiliate partner nedostává zaplaceno za lead, ale v případě sjednané a zaplacené smlouvy u těch ostatních poptávek (havarijní pojištění, pojištění majetku a cestovní pojištění) se partnerovi počítá provize normálně dle podle podmínek dané kampaně." ---

 

Zákaz bidování na klíčová slova a názvy uvedené v TOMTO DOKUMENTU! Porušení tohoto zákazu může vést k blokaci v kampaních ePojisteni.cz.

name: HDFC Pixel Credit Card [ CPL ] IN
description:
Drive high-intent leads for the HDFC Pixel Play Credit Card, a tailor-made financial product designed for digitally savvy and entertainment-first users. This campaign operates on a Cost Per Lead (CPL) model, where you are paid for every qualified lead generated through your promotional efforts.

Campaign Objective:
Generate qualified leads (completed application forms) from users interested in applying for the HDFC Pixel Play Credit Card. Leads must meet predefined eligibility criteria.

Payout Model: Cost Per Lead (CPL) – Fixed payout per approved lead
